## DateTimeSelector interface

Describes datetime selector component used for displaying and selecting value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DateTimeSelector<TDate = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [format](./datetime.datetimeselector.format.md) | string | Currently used format for displaying data |
|  [formattedValue](./datetime.datetimeselector.formattedvalue.md) | string \| null | Gets formatted value |
|  [pickerRequest](./datetime.datetimeselector.pickerrequest.md) | Observable&lt;boolean&gt; | Occurs when selector requires picker to be displayed or hidden |
|  [placeholder?](./datetime.datetimeselector.placeholder.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Placeholder that is displayed when there is no value selected |
|  [touched](./datetime.datetimeselector.touched.md) | Observable&lt;void&gt; | Occurs when selector is touched by user |
|  [valid](./datetime.datetimeselector.valid.md) | boolean | Gets indication whether is current value valid |
|  [value](./datetime.datetimeselector.value.md) | [DateTimeValue](./datetime.datetimevalue.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt; \| null | Gets current value of datetime |
|  [valueChange](./datetime.datetimeselector.valuechange.md) | Observable&lt;void&gt; | Occurs when value changes |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [invalidateVisuals()](./datetime.datetimeselector.invalidatevisuals.md) | Explicitly runs invalidation of content (change detection) |
|  [setDisabled(disabled)](./datetime.datetimeselector.setdisabled.md) | Sets as 'control' disabled |
|  [setMaxValue(value)](./datetime.datetimeselector.setmaxvalue.md) | Sets maximal possible value for picker, that can be picked |
|  [setMinValue(value)](./datetime.datetimeselector.setminvalue.md) | Sets minimal possible value for picker, that can be picked |
|  [setValue(value)](./datetime.datetimeselector.setvalue.md) | Sets value of datetime selector |
